short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See stacker.news every time you open a new browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new tab default screen showing your the Stacker.news homepage. Stacker Tab is a community built extension and is not, in any way, affiliated with Stacker News.

Open Source Code: https://github.com/dylanbathurst/stacker-tab
